data.name: Veg out Crew FPS
data.detailed_description:
You are Carro, the lone carrot on a mission to take back the Veg out World from all the moldy fruits and vegetables.

A throw back to the old classics of how the FPS originated. Get in and get blasting with all the weaponry you can handle and the enemies you can blast!

What you can expect:

  • Over 15 different weapons and more to come
  • 3 single player stages filled with enemies, weapons and some retro artwork
  • A heap of enemies to keep the entertainment and adrenaline pumping
  • 3 different bosses to keep you on your toes and wanting more
  • A survival mode where enemies keep on spawning

Casually rocking out the pea shooter and hotdog gun!!


Another epic weapon with the tomato launcher just thumping down those enemies!


So what are you waiting for? Get in there as Carro and do some damage and blast your way through the Veg out World.

Also, come join in on the discord at https://discord.gg/hrUmsm9EPE and help shape our game.

Happy Veg out Crew! :)

data.short_description: You are Carro, the lone carrot on a mission to take back the Veg out World from all the moldy fruits and vegetables. Make sure your locked and loaded for some fun, old school, retro, shooter action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
